name: .QLPLUGIN File Extension
summary: Learn about .QLPLUGIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: QLPLUGIN files are not meant to be opened. Instead, they are meant to be installed while using QuickLook (Windows). After you download a QLPLUGIN file, you can install it by previewing the QLPLUGIN file in QuickLook. In the preview window, select the Click here to install this plugin. button to install your QLPLUGIN file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
